scripts.audit:lightning: npm run type-check && cd src-tauri && cargo check && npm test
scripts.audit:security: npm audit && cd src-tauri && cargo audit
scripts.audit:selectors: grep -r 'prompt-textarea\|ProseMirror\|ql-editor\|searchbox' src/lib/types.ts || echo 'No selector patterns found'
scripts.audit:resources: grep -A5 -B5 'closeWebview\|unlisten\|pool_size' src/ || echo 'Resource patterns check complete'
scripts.audit:performance: npm run build && ls -la dist/ && du -sh dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Performance audit complete'
scripts.audit:full: npm run audit:lightning && npm run audit:security && npm run audit:resources
